metadata.name: Apo Fluphenazine Tab 2 5mg 1 MG Tablet coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For management of manifestations of psychotic disorders

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Fluphenazine is a trifluoro methyl phenothiazine derivative intended for the management of schizophrenia and other psychotic disorders Fluphenazine has not been shown effective in the management of behaviorial complications in patients with mental retardation
